body: Hmm I think that will break existing users who uses the INT8 api. Maybe just ignore `use_calibration` when precision_mode is not INT8, and mentioned the behavior in the comment/doc-string of `create_inference_graph()`.
body_html: Hmm I think that will break existing users who uses the INT8 api. Maybe just ignore use_calibration when precision_mode is not INT8, and mentioned the behavior in the comment/doc-string of create_inference_graph().
body_text: Hmm I think that will break existing users who uses the INT8 api. Maybe just ignore use_calibration when precision_mode is not INT8, and mentioned the behavior in the comment/doc-string of create_inference_graph().
